name: Knight vs dragon
description:
A great story starting by a knigt.

Knight vs a dragon is a rpg adventure game with a rich story and alot of action.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The plot;

a princess is captured by an evil dragon.

the king needs help, and then the brave knight comes in the take the challenge.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Gameplay;

an addicting advneture awates you. fight the fierce and clam the ultimate victory

for your kingdom.
